00013 class DS7505
00014 {
00015 public:
00016 
00018   enum Resolution {
00019     RES_09 = 0x0, 
00020     RES_10 = 0x1, 
00021     RES_11 = 0x2, 
00022     RES_12 = 0x3, 
00023   };
00024 
00026 
00035   enum FaultTolerance {
00036     FT_1 = 0x0, 
00037     FT_2 = 0x1, 
00038     FT_4 = 0x2, 
00039     FT_6 = 0x3, 
00040   };
00041 
00043   enum Register {
00044     P_TEMP = 0x0, // temperature
00045     P_CONF = 0x1, // configuration
00046     P_THYST = 0x2, // Thyst
00047     P_TOS = 0x3, // Tos
00048   };
00049 
00051   enum Command {
00052     // command set
00053     CMD_RECALL_DATA = 0xB8,
00054     CMD_COPY_DATA = 0x48,
00055     CMD_POR = 0x54,
00056   };
00057 
00059   DS7505() {};
00060 
00062   float getTempC() { return getTemp(P_TEMP); }
00063 
00065   float getTempF() { return 9.0/5.0 * getTemp(P_TEMP) + 32.0; }
00066 
00068 
00074   float getTempC(Register regPdef) { return getTemp(regPdef); }
00075 
00077 
00083   float getTempF(Register regPdef) { return 9.0/5.0 * getTemp(regPdef) + 32.0;}
00084 
00086 
00090   float setThermostatC(float t) { setThermostatC(t, t - 5.0); }
00091 
00093 
00097   float setThermostatF(float t) { setThermostatF(t, t - 5.0); }
00098 
00100 
00104   float setThermostatC(float tos, float thyst) { setThermostatC(tos, thyst, FT_1); }
00105 
00107 
00111   float setThermostatF(float tos, float thyst) { setThermostatF(tos, thyst, FT_1); }
00112 
00114 
00119   float setThermostatC(float tos, float thyst, FaultTolerance ft) { setThermostat(tos, thyst, ft); }
00120 
00122 
00127   float setThermostatF(float tos, float thyst, FaultTolerance ft) { setThermostat((tos - 32.0) * 5.0 / 9.0, (thyst - 32.0) * 5.0 / 9.0, ft); }
00128 
00130 
00142   void setConfigRegister(byte configByte);
00143 
00145   /*
00146    * \param cmdSet:
00147    *    CMD_RECALL_DATA
00148    *    CMD_COPY_DATA
00149    *    CMD_POR
00150    */
00151   void sendCommand(byte cmdSet);
00152 
00154 
00160   void init(uint8_t a2, uint8_t a1, uint8_t a0, Resolution res);
00161 
00162 private:
00163   uint8_t _i2cAddr;
00164   uint8_t _configByte;
00165 
00166   //get temperature, overloaded (Celsius)
00167   //    regPdef:
00168   //            P_TEMP: get temperature in Celsius
00169   //            P_THYST: get hysteresis temperature
00170   //            P_OS: get trip temperature
00171   float getTemp(byte regPdef);
00172 
00173   //set thermostat temperature, overloaded (Celsius)
00174   //    tos: trip temperature
00175   //    thyst: hysteresis temperature
00176   //    ft: fault tolerance (consecutive out-of-limits conversions before tripping)
00177   //            FT_1, FT_2, FT_4, FT_6
00178   void setThermostat(float tos, float thyst, byte ft);
